scripts.build-libs: ng build auth-lib && ng build commons-lib
scripts.build-fronts-dev: ng build mf-booking && ng build mf-catalog && ng build mf-company && ng build mf-dashboard && ng build mf-host && ng build mf-report && ng build mf-user
scripts.build-fronts-qa: ng build mf-booking --base-href /canchapp/mf-booking/ --configuration=qa && ng build mf-catalog --base-href /canchapp/mf-catalog/ --configuration=qa && ng build mf-company --base-href /canchapp/mf-company/ --configuration=qa && ng build mf-dashboard --base-href /canchapp/mf-dashboard/ --configuration=qa && ng build mf-host --configuration=qa && ng build mf-report --base-href /canchapp/mf-report/ --configuration=qa && ng build mf-user --base-href /canchapp/mf-user/ --configuration=qa
scripts.build-fronts-prod: ng build mf-booking --configuration=prod && ng build mf-catalog --configuration=prod && ng build mf-company --configuration=prod && ng build mf-dashboard --configuration=prod && ng build mf-host --configuration=prod && ng build mf-report --configuration=prod && ng build mf-user --configuration=prod
scripts.build-all-dev: npm run replace-apis-dev && npm run build-libs && npm run build-fronts-dev
scripts.build-all-qa: npm run replace-apis-qa && npm run build-libs && npm run build-fronts-qa
scripts.build-all-prod: npm run replace-apis-pro && npm run build-libs && npm run build-fronts-prod
